about_the_game: This game invites players into a magical winter night adventure, where they play as a brave beetle making its way through the snow. The game features stunning visuals, with a snowy ground contrasting beautifully against the deep blue night sky, creating a serene yet mysterious atmosphere. Players use the keyboard to control the beetle, avoiding various obstacles and traps, such as pits and suddenly appearing monsters. If the beetle falls into a trap or collides with a monster, the game ends. However, the beetle has a special ability—it can load itself into a cannon and be fired out at the right moment to leap over obstacles. Along the way, players can collect gold coins scattered along the path, which not only increase the score but also come with rich sound effects, adding much fun to the gameplay. This is a game that tests players' reaction speed and strategic planning, perfect for those who enjoy a challenge.
